name: getADevice
description:
Get detailed information about a specific [desk phone device](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360021119092).

**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or a higher account with Zoom Phone license * Account owner or admin permissions
**Scopes:** `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

$ul: **assignee**: User to whom the device has been assigned.
**extension_number**: Extension number of the Zoom Phone used by the user.
**id**: User ID of the user to whom the device has been assigned.
**device_type**: Includes manufacturer name and the model name.
**id**: Device ID - Unique Identifier of the Device.
**mac_address**: MAC address or serial number of the device.
**sip_accounts**: SIP Account details registered during the device provisioning process. This object will only be returned if manual provisioning was used for the device.
**type**: [Provisioning type](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360033223411). The value can be one of the following:
**url**: Provisioning URL. This field will only be returned for devices that were provisioned via `assisted` provisioning type.
**status**: Status of the device. The value is either `online` or `offline`.
